summary: Haines plays the role of a festive British nobleman, for whom a marriage has been arranged by his relatives. He goes to a European Summer resort and poses as a gigolo to meet the girl ... See full summary »
cast: William Haines|Irene Purcell|C. Aubrey Smith|Charlotte Granville|Lilian Bond|Albert Conti|Maria Alba|Ray Milland|Lenore Bushman|Gerald Fielding|Yola d'Avril|Norman Ainsley|Henry Armetta|George Davis|Ann Dvorak|Torben Meyer|Rolfe Sedan
title: Nada más que un gigoló
